_sText:
This is the 2nd version of my awp map. It has drastically changed for the better. There are more things to do.

Check out the screenshots.

EDIT: After more testing it has been found that the left side teleport on the CT side is flawed and the player gets stuck in the wall. This will be a fix in v3 that comes out some time within the next 3 days.

Bugs found in v2:

Flawed teleport
Water too shallow
Too bright
Walls on 2nd level buildings can be shot through
Very tough to jump over top and down onto battlefield area

Some things missing that will be in v3:

trigger_push where the long straight walkways are so it goes quicker and you dont get shot

Deeper water so you dont get health deducted when you fall

A more intricately designed bunker in the middle

Fix up the awp arena so that there are places you can stand up and still be protected.

Doors so you can exit the spawn area into the middle, yet you cant enter back in.

Teleports that bring you back into your own spawn if you so desire.

Some secrets

Fix bugs



The giant platform in the middle IS breakable. by the way

Thanks to:
.4ngryToasters
Cleav420
And the Interlopers forum regulars who helped me fix my compile problem!
